participant_1.background:
I'd love to go to a game with my brother and then cook the game we caught.
I enjoy tinkering and building things in my spare time.
I have an old, dusty laptop that I use to keep in touch with my family.

i like to drink.

participant_2.background:
My favorite music is chill music, as it helps me to relax and concentrate on my work.
I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills.
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
I read children's books to make myself feel younger.

content.text: Not much. Just working on my french fry designs.
That sounds cool. I'm not sure I know what you mean.
Oh, I want to create new and innovative ways to make french fries. I think it's an untapped market.
That's a really cool idea. I'm not sure I've ever had designer french fries.
Well, you're missing out. They're amazing. I've been working on them for a while now.
Sounds like you're pretty passionate about it.
I am! I think it's a really fun project and I'm excited to see where it goes.
Well, I'm sure it'll be a success. You seem to know what you're doing.
So, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to read children's books. I find them really relaxing.
That's interesting. Why do you like them so much?
I like the simple stories and the illustrations. They're just really calming to me.
That's cool. I've never really thought about reading children's books as a relaxing activity before.
You should try it sometime. It's really nice.
I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
